short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically removes all members from Facebook group. Bulk Remove Group Members and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bulk remove members from your Facebook group so that you can delete the group easily with a single click. Works for Admin as well as Moderators both.

How it works:
- Open the Group member page first
- Click on extension icon
- Click on Remove all Group Members
All members will be removed automatically one by one.

Many more new features coming soon.

For any issue, report to us via email. Thank you!
